name: Owens Corning Attic Stair Insulator Foil Pink Fiberglass R-10
description: This easy-to-install insulator closes the insulation gap created by attic stair access. The insulator is comprised of durable, pink fiberglass insulation and tough, highly reflective foil. There is no assembly required; simply unfold and place over the stairway opening. The lightweight design provides comfort for your home year-round.Available in one standard size to fit most attic stairwell openingsDesigned to cover access points up to 25-1/2 in. x 54 in.Comes fully assembled and is easy to install and removeR-10 rated and helps reduce energy loss year-roundGREENGUARD certifiedBuying guide and insulation calculator:
